name: Galidroo
description: The Galidroo is a huge creature with two heads, demonstrating exceptional physical prowess and psychic abilities. Its skin is tough, and it exhibits a formidable presence, showcasing its immense power and threatening demeanor.
memorable: With its Aura of Lassitude and Prophetic Screech, the Galidroo can incapacitate foes and control the flow of battle effectively.
goals: Typically seeks to weaken opponents and control the battlefield using its debilitating abilities.
relations: May be accompanied by other creatures that benefit from psychic powers or share an evil alignment.
environment: Usually found in dark, hidden places where it can ambush or control its surroundings.
strengths: Immunity to psychic damage, and possesses multiple high-level attacks and debilitating abilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to strong magical attacks that can bypass its resistances.
attacks: Executes a Multiattack, making two Bite and two Claw attacks, or can use its Tail to grapple foes, dealing substantial damage.
most_powerful_ability: Prophetic Screech, which can incapacitate foes and deal significant psychic damage.
senses: Has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks due to its two heads, enhancing its ability to notice hidden threats.
skills: Proficient in Perception with a +8 bonus, allowing it to easily spot hidden or stealthy creatures.
additional_information: Aura of Lassitude makes foes lethargic if they fail a saving throw.
Selective Precognition allows it to cast divination and legend lore without components.
Can grapple Large or smaller creatures with its Tail attack.
spellcasting: Can cast divination and legend lore once per day each, using Wisdom as its spellcasting ability.
